description:
Loosely based on the Kosmo chassis from his YouTube channel.

I have multiple versions to fit your needs. 
 Chassis Cab
 Stake Bed
 Dump Bed
 Box Bed
 Mobile Base
 Flat Bed
 Rollback (Slide Version)
 Rollback (Arm Version)

 All my items are mod free. All vanilla parts with no glitches or hacks being used. All downloads have been tested in creative and survival modes. For importing workshop items to survival some pretty good youtube tutorials are available. 

Vehicle Details-
 This download is for the Flat Bed version. This version comes with a large flat bed. Rear suspension is an independent set up with dual offroad suspension on each axle. Driver and passenger doors open as well as the hood.

Vehicle Functions-
1: Doors
2: Hood
3: Horn
4: Main Lights
5: Aux Lights
6: Cargo Lights
7: Not Used
8: Not Used
9: Not Used
0: Not Used

Other Vehicle Notes-
 If you have issues getting out or want to get out faster just remove the sunroof.

Vehicle Storage-
 4 - Large Chests
 2 - Fuel Container
 1 - Water Container
 2 - Ammo Container
 1 - Battery Container
name: Locura T650 Flat Bed
